Uses of Class
units.Unit

  • Packages that use Unit 
    Package Description
    displayManager
    The Display Manager module projects content visually for human players.
    gameManager
    The next set of classes to be described is the Game Manager Classes, it isn’t as much of a set of classes but simply a singular class.
    gameMaster
    The Game Master is primarily responsible for keeping track of which player's turn it is, and determining win/loss game states once 3 or fewer units remain and a turn is ended.
    gameState
    The Game State is the meat of the Model for this version of the Model View Controller architecture.
    interpreter
    The interpreter module is designed to be utilized when a robot has a unit that needs to make a play.
    player
    The player sub system contains classes for Players and Robots, both of which have a single field which is their list of robots.
    units
    The units module is used to represent a “game piece” from the RoboSports board game.
